column5: Never have I been a fan of his methods...  The biggest 2 things the Canadians were missing last night was Confidence, and subsiquently they lacked Presence. The two go hand and hand!  Where oh where was the Physical game they played against the States, Germany, Slovakia? Where was the Quick acurate passing, or the quick release shots? Their heads were clouded with doubt and Nervousness... You could see them second guessing their plays, and more importantly they were second guessing their Hits. Why? Because they were afraid they would miss, or let their man go...  I'll tell you this, Benching your guys, Sitting silently on the back bench and deviateing from your game plan is not the way to bolster confidence in your boys. Its shows your scrambleing... Changes are for Practices, not for Game time.  Dump and chase BANG BANG BANG Along the boards, Cycle, and crash the net...thats how we've won medals all these years, thats how we made it this far, and THATS how its going to be done tommorrow. The minute we try and play cutesy-poo Euro hockey we're done...nobody plays better Euro hockey better then the swedes.  A Physical game will knock the Swedes game plan out of the rink. BANG BANG BANG!!!!  They need to forget that poke checking crap, and get back to takeing the Body, and taking it hard! Its hard to make a fancy passing play to your wingers when they are slowly getting up off the ice about 10 strides behind you.

Thanks, you said it a lot better than I could of that's for sure.  I would of been called a racist if I would of meant what you stated but said it in my words.  I know when I played in a physical game, non physical players seemed to be shy of the puck and would quickly pass as not get hit (Hurt).  Like the Swedes (EDIT.... in the past) and other non Canadian teams except maybe the USA
The problem is they played like crap the rest of the game.

There's No racism in hockey.....just different places and styles to play it But only one style thats truely Canadian, and thats Dump and chase, in your face bang and crash real mans hockey! GO CANADA GO!!!!!
5.4 SECONDS LEFT.....LETS GO CANADA!!!!!
OMG IT,S GOING TO OVER TIME,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,THATS HEART. GO CANADA GO.
Heck Yeah that was awesome Roll this is a great third. So how close to my place are you guys fishing tomorrow? If yer heading this way and not east I might head over there if its not raining by then.
I think im gonna be sticking around sarnia tomorrow....gotta save money for my trip on tuesday  Misfish....you gonna be up near burksfalls this coming week?
I am having to listen as TSN limits it's online viewing to Canadian IP's.  couldn't believe the call with less than a minute left.
Under 5 to go in Overtime. They better pull this one out!!!!!
SHOOTOUT!  Let's go boys
Shoot out coming up,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  Im not confident,but hey,it,s a shoot out.    Send me a pm with contact bud.
can you say  SHOOTOUT!!!!!!!
OVER!
WEL DONE BOYS
can you say  FINALS
I was surprised at the no fancy stick play of the Russians. Thought that would of killed us in the shoot out.
That was simply the most electrifing game i've watched in ages, simply amazing!!!!WOW!!!

Maybe I should have posted my reply in this thread LOL...    Ya!!!!!!  What a nail biter! Cripes that was a bloody rooler coaster eh?  They boys looked flat the whole game until Over time IMO...2 soft russian goals as well. Not nearly as good as the USA match, but way more intense in the end!  I was not looking forward to a shoot out...kinda figured we'd get screwed, but hey it all worked out!
I almost had to leave the room hahahah

After catching glimpses of the game all night I happened to turn it back on when there was 11 seconds left, just in time to see we were losing and the puck pretty much frozen along the boards up near the blue line...just goes to show it ain't over till its over!! Fantastic finish.
lucky, they didnt play well.  there goalie let in some softies to.  they must bring the A game against a great swedish club.  GO CANADA GO!  cheers!

I'm really glad they pulled that one out!  I'm going to the Gold medal game with my wife, leaving tomorrow a.m., part of an OLG slots package she won.  Get to watch from a box....so glad they won, will make the game a lot more sweet!

I agree with the comment made earlier, they ended up on the right side of the ledger and worked hard to the end, but it wasn't a pretty performance at many times during the game .  I hope they don't make the same mistakes on Monday.   Bottom line they ground out a win and that's the main thing.  Go Canada.

Those players were so nervous and it showed.  They were afraid and wern't confident.  They didn't play well but managed the win nonetheless.  I freaking hate shootouts, what a horrible way to end one of the craziest games in this tournaments history. That overtime had me on edge the entire period, I loved every second of it and then suddenly felt 'meh' after winning in the shootout on a whopping 2 shots. I feel terrible for the russian players, it's not the way a classic game should end.  Their performance was definitely not gold worthy imo last night, they must step it up and get shots on net from the D on the power play.  I think they went 1-9 on the powerplay, if they play like that tomorrow Sweden will destroy them.  Lets hope they BRING IT tomorrow and take down them down as they did in exhibition play (4-2).  Sweden has only allowed 6 goals all tournament (Including yesterdays 5-3 win), they got the best GAA in the tourny.  Canada has to get their offense rolling and use their depth and not 2 lines like yesterday.  Wasn't the best coaching from Quinn that's for sure.

I agree 100% Governator, ending a game like that with a shoot out is shameful! Ask the 19,000 in attendance if they wanted that game to end and go to a shootout 0.0 would say yes. Fun game to watch but the boys need to tighten there game up!

Its awesome to see a young group of guys pull together in the crunch to pull out a win they had no business winning. Too bad for the Russian kids, they IMO battled harder and prolly should have won that game in regulation but lets hope our boys learned from that fiasco and get their carp together for the GOLD. After all thats what they came to get, thats the only thing they will be happy with. Better light a fire under their a$$ Quinn. Its theirs for the takin.
